title.no: Wurlitzer 200A med Roger Mayer Voodoo-Vibe+ vibrato
title.en: Wurlitzer 200A with Roger Mayer Voodoo-Vibe+ vibrato

content.no:
Wurlitzer 200A elektrisk piano med vibrato fra en Roger Mayer Voodoo-Vibe+ effekt pedal.
Signalet er sendt gjennom en Fender Twin Reverb forsterker som er mikket opp med en Shure SM57.
Instrument: Wurlitzer 200
Effekt pedal: Roger Mayer Voodoo-Vibe+
Forsterker: Fender Twin Reverb Amp
content.en:
Wurlitzer 200A electric piano with vibrato from a Roger Mayer Voodoo-Vibe+ effects pedal.
The signal is going through a Fender Twin Reverb amplifier, mic'd with a Shure SM57.
Instrument: Wurlitzer 200A
Effects: Roger Mayer Voodoo-Vibe+
Amplifier: Fender Twin Reverb Amp

thumbnailDescription: A Wurlitzer 200A electric piano being played

content.no:
Hohner Clavinet D6 med en DigiTech Whammy pedal.
Det er også en fuzz pedal, litt slapback ekko og en fjærklang i effektkjeden.
Jeg spiller gjennom en Vox AC15H1TV forsterker.
Effekter: DigiTech Whammy (5th Gen), Dunlop / Dallas Arbiter Fuzz Face, Boss DM-2 Delay og VanAmps Sole-Mate Jr.
Forsterker: Vox AC15H1TV
Instrument: Hohner Clavinet D6
content.en:
Hohner Clavinet D6 with a DigiTech Whammy pedal.
I've also added a fuzz pedal, some slapback delay and a spring reverb in the effects chain.
I'm playing through a Vox AC15H1TV amplifier.
Effects: DigiTech Whammy (5th Gen), Dunlop / Dallas Arbiter Fuzz Face, Boss DM-2 Delay and VanAmps Sole-Mate Jr.
Amplifier: Vox AC15H1TV
Instrument: Hohner Clavinet D6

thumbnailDescription: A Hohner Clavinet D6 and a DigiTech Whammy pedal

title.en: Hammond organ with fuzz and guitar amp

content.no:
Hammond C3 med Fuzz Face inn i en Vox AC15H1TV.
Metallboksen med den store knotten demper det kraftige signalet fra orgelet før det treffer Fuzz Face-pedalen.
Effekter: Dehli Musikk Attenuator Box og Dunlop / Dallas Arbiter Fuzz Face
Forsterker: Vox AC15H1TV
Instrument: Hammond C3
content.en:
Hammond C3 with Fuzz Face into a Vox AC15H1TV.
The metal box with the big knob attenuates the hot signal from the organ before it hits the Fuzz Face.
Effects: Dehli Musikk Attenuator Box and Dunlop / Dallas Arbiter Fuzz Face
Amplifier: Vox AC15H1TV
Instrument: Hammond C3

thumbnailDescription: A Hammond C3 organ being played
